languages.text: "Словно... бездонное синее море..." {n}Кассия ошарашенно озирается по сторонам, переводя взгляд с одного ксеноса на другого.{/n} "Я... не думала, что кто-то вообще способен источать столь глубокий цвет. Хотела бы я его перекрасить".

traits.locale_text: "Словно... бездонное синее море..." {n}Кассия ошарашенно озирается по сторонам, переводя взгляд с одного ксеноса на другого.{/n} "Я... не думала, что кто-то вообще способен источать столь глубокий цвет. Хотела бы я его перекрасить".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Like... a sea of bottomless blue..." {n}Cassia looks around her with a stunned expression, her gaze shifting from one xenos to another.{/n} "I... I did not know that living things could exude such saturated hues. I wish I could paint this ocean a different colour."
languages.original_text: "Словно... бездонное синее море..." {n}Кассия ошарашенно озирается по сторонам, переводя взгляд с одного ксеноса на другого.{/n} "Я... не думала, что кто-то вообще способен источать столь глубокий цвет. Хотела бы я его перекрасить".

traits.locale_text: "Like... a sea of bottomless blue..." {n}Cassia looks around her with a stunned expression, her gaze shifting from one xenos to another.{/n} "I... I did not know that living things could exude such deep hues. I wish I could paint this ocean a different colour."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like... a sea of bottomless blue..." {n}Cassia looks around her with a stunned expression, her gaze shifting from one xenos to another.{/n} "I... I did not know that living things could exude such saturated hues. I wish I could paint this ocean a different colour."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「まるで…底なしの青い海…」{n}カシアは呆然とした表情で異種族一人一人に視線を移しながら周囲を見回す。{/n}「あたくしは…生きたものがここまで詰め込まれた色をあふれさせるなんて、知りませんでした。あたくしがこの海を別の色に塗り替えられればいいのでしょうが」
languages.original_text: "Like... a sea of bottomless blue..." {n}Cassia looks around her with a stunned expression, her gaze shifting from one xenos to another.{/n} "I... I did not know that living things could exude such saturated hues. I wish I could paint this ocean a different colour."

traits.locale_text: 「まるで…底なしの青い海…」{n}カシアは呆然とした表情で異種族一人一人に視線を移しながら周囲を見回す。{/n}「あたくしは…生きたものがここまで詰め込まれた色をあふれさせるなんて、知りませんでした。あたくしがこの海を別の色に塗り替えられればいいのでしょうが」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “就像……无底的蓝色海洋……”{n}卡西娅目瞪口呆地环顾四周，视线中一名异形转移到另一名异形身上。{/n}“我……我从来不知道，生物居然能散发出如此饱和的色调。我真希望把这片海洋涂成不同的颜色。”
languages.original_text: "Like... a sea of bottomless blue..." {n}Cassia looks around her with a stunned expression, her gaze shifting from one xenos to another.{/n} "I... I did not know that living things could exude such saturated hues. I wish I could paint this ocean a different colour."

traits.locale_text: “就像……无底的蓝色海洋……”{n}卡西娅目瞪口呆地环顾四周，视线中一名异形转移到另一名异形身上。{/n}“我……我从来不知道，生物居然能散发出如此饱和的色调。我真希望把这片海洋涂成不同的颜色。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Comme... une mer bleue insondable... » {n}Cassia regarde un à un les xénos qui l'entourent, l'air stupéfait.{/n} « Je... j'ignorais que des êtres vivants pouvaient irradier d'une nuance aussi saturée. J'aimerais pouvoir peindre cet océan d'une autre couleur. »
languages.original_text: "Like... a sea of bottomless blue..." {n}Cassia looks around her with a stunned expression, her gaze shifting from one xenos to another.{/n} "I... I did not know that living things could exude such saturated hues. I wish I could paint this ocean a different colour."

traits.locale_text: « Comme... une mer bleue insondable... » {n}Cassia regarde un à un les xénos qui l'entourent, l'air stupéfait.{/n} « Je... j'ignorais que des êtres vivants pouvaient irradier d'une nuance aussi saturée. J'aimerais pouvoir peindre cet océan d'une autre couleur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Como... un mar azul sin fondo...». {n}Cassia mira a su alrededor estupefacta, pasando la mirada de un xenos a otro.{/n} «No... no sabía que los seres vivos podían emitir unos tonos tan saturados. Ojalá pudiera pintar este océano de otro color».
languages.original_text: "Like... a sea of bottomless blue..." {n}Cassia looks around her with a stunned expression, her gaze shifting from one xenos to another.{/n} "I... I did not know that living things could exude such saturated hues. I wish I could paint this ocean a different colour."

traits.locale_text: «Como... un mar azul sin fondo...». {n}Cassia mira a su alrededor estupefacta, pasando la mirada de un xenos a otro.{/n} «No... no sabía que los seres vivos podían emitir unos tonos tan saturados. Ojalá pudiera pintar este océano de otro color».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie ... ein Meer aus bodenlosem Blau ..." {n}Cassia blickt sich mit fassungsloser Miene um. Ihr Blick springt von einem Xenos zum nächsten.{/n} "Ich ... Ich wusste nicht, dass Lebewesen derart gesättigte Farbtöne ausstrahlen können. Ich wünschte, ich könnte diesen Ozean in einer anderen Farbe malen."
languages.original_text: "Like... a sea of bottomless blue..." {n}Cassia looks around her with a stunned expression, her gaze shifting from one xenos to another.{/n} "I... I did not know that living things could exude such saturated hues. I wish I could paint this ocean a different colour."

traits.locale_text: "Wie ... ein Meer aus bodenlosem Blau ..." {n}Cassia blickt sich mit fassungsloser Miene um. Ihr Blick springt von einem Xenos zum nächsten.{/n} "Ich ... Ich wusste nicht, dass Lebewesen derart gesättigte Farbtöne ausstrahlen können. Ich wünschte, ich könnte diesen Ozean in einer anderen Farbe malen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sanki... Masmavi, dipsiz bir deniz gibi..." {n}Cassia, sersemlemiş bir yüz ifadesiyle etrafına bakınıyor. Bakışları bir zenodan diğerine geçiyor.{/n} "Ben... Canlıların böylesine dolgun renk tonları yayabileceğini bilmiyordum. Keşke bu okyanusu başka bir renge boyayabilsem."
languages.original_text: "Like... a sea of bottomless blue..." {n}Cassia looks around her with a stunned expression, her gaze shifting from one xenos to another.{/n} "I... I did not know that living things could exude such saturated hues. I wish I could paint this ocean a different colour."

traits.locale_text: "Sanki... Masmavi, dipsiz bir deniz gibi..." {n}Cassia, sersemlemiş bir yüz ifadesiyle etrafına bakınıyor. Bakışları bir zenodan diğerine geçiyor.{/n} "Ben... Canlıların böylesine dolgun renk tonları yayabileceğini bilmiyordum. Keşke bu okyanusu başka bir renge boyayabilsem."
